desc: Australian Cut Throat Razor Specialists Including Straight Razors, Leather Strops, Shaving Brushes, and Honing Stones. Dovo, Muhle, Shapton, Boker. Afterpay Available, Free Shipping, Express Options, Same Day Dispatch.

layout.text: Get a clean cut shave with our new range of complete straight edge razor kits, carefully crafted by the professionals.
